New-York Historical Society
Philip Pope declaration of imports
Pope, Philip, active 1836
AHMC - Pope, Philip
1 item(s)
1836 June 7 One declaration made and signed by Philip Pope at the Custom House of Wilmington, Delaware. Using a pre-printed form, Pope declared the importation of wrought iron from Cardiff on the ship Mary Ann under Arthur Child as master.
To request this material for research, and for fuller information about it, please follow this link to the record in N-YHS's catalog, Bobcat: Philip Pope declaration of imports
